pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
